description: Kirishima Kotone is the twin sister of http://anidb.net/ch11649 [Akari] and the older of the two. She, along with her sister, are the daughters of the http://anidb.net/ch11092 [Buddhist monk] in the temple. Despite her gentle and sweet outward demeanor, she is interested in http://anidb.net/ch10840 [Junpei] mainly because of his misfortunes, and can be considered sadistic, delusional, and an obsessive stalker.
name: Kirishima Kotone
